trans-unit.source: Provides <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> objects with CodeDOM serialization services.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> CodeDOM 序列化服務的物件。

trans-unit.source: This is the base class from which other CodeDOM serializers, such as the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializer"></xref>, are inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這是基底類別，其他 CodeDOM 序列化程式，例如<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializer"> </xref>，會繼承。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] DependencyObjectCodeDomSerializer controls the generation of component initialization code for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject> class at design time.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]DependencyObjectCodeDomSerializer 控制元件初始化程式碼的產生<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject>在設計階段的類別。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.DependencyObjectCodeDomSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.DependencyObjectCodeDomSerializer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified object into a CodeDOM object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件序列化為 CodeDOM 物件。

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager to use during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 要在序列化期間使用的序列化管理員。

trans-unit.source: A CodeDOM object that represents the object that has been serialized.
trans-unit.target: CodeDOM 物件，表示已序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: manager or obj contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: manager或obj包含 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。
